pr_title: [TA] Added offset and length support in CatorizedEntities and LinkedEntitiesMatch

timeline.message: added offset and length for CategorizedEntities and LinkedEntitesMatch
refactor other endpoint besides analyze sentiment

timeline.bodyText: @maririos made this comment on my PR too, but it would be clearer if this was "Get the offset of the linked entity match text"
timeline.author: iscai-msft

timeline.bodyText: next time can you make these other test changes in another PR, it's a little hard to see what actual tests were added for offset and length
timeline.author: iscai-msft

timeline.bodyText: should we keep the offset and length after confidenceScore so that someone that depended on previous constructor would use this by just appending properties?
timeline.author: maririos
maririos

timeline.bodyText: is this just cleanup? or what is the motivation for these changes
timeline.author: maririos

replies.bodyText: To add getDetectedLanguageEnglish(), getDetectedLanguageSpanish(), and getUnknownDetectedLanguage() helper methods. These result repeatedly used over many place, such as atomic operation.
replies.author: mssfang

timeline.bodyText:
my concern with having all this tests to look at specific values is that if the service changes something about their model, then our test will fail.
Make sure whenever u call this that the model-version is set to avoid it
timeline.author: maririos

replies.bodyText:
Sounds good. Will take care of model-version in another PR. Since TA hasn't apply the model version in other APIs.
issue created: #13943
replies.author: mssfang
